REQUEST FOR FEEDBACK

Invite friends and colleagues to create a Lens<sup>™</sup> on your behalf, and they'll be asked a series of questions that will yield a summary of your personality type through their eyes. This analysis of your notable characteristics will reveal increasingly personalized learning pathways to grow your ERT-i<sup>™</sup> by influencing the types of practice areas recommended for you in your development plan.

The Prism Lens<sup>®</sup> is a powerful way to learn how others perceive you. How you're perceived is significant for growing your emotional, relational and team intelligence (ERT-i<sup>®</sup>), and reflects how others see your personal brand.
This email address already exists in your feedback team. Please select a different email address to proceed.
